Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Overview: Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from the high-stakes of being a super-hero. When he asks for help from Doctor Strange the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Overview: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and protect Rocket’s life at all costs.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Overview: Billy Batson and his foster siblings face the Daughters of Atlas who threaten to destroy the world.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Overview: Miles Morales embarks on a journey across the Multiverse to team up with Gwen Stacy and other Spider-People to face a new threat.

Title: Top Gun: Maverick
Overview: After more than thirty years of service, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator.

Title: The Creator
Overview: In a future war between humans and AI, an ex-special forces agent is recruited to find and destroy a powerful weapon.

Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Overview: The Autobots team up with a new faction of Transformers known as the Maximals to save Earth.

Title: Oppenheimer
Overview: A dramatization of the life story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and the creation of the atomic bomb.

Title: Barbie
Overview: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land, until they go to the real world.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Overview: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne, along with Hank Pym and Janet Van Dyne, explore the Quantum Realm.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Overview: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family on the planet Pandora. A familiar threat returns to finish what was started.

Title: Blue Beetle
Overview: An alien scarab chooses a teenager to be its symbiotic host, bestowing him with a suit of armor.

Title: Paw Patrol: The Mighty Movie
Overview: The PAW Patrol pups get superpowers and must save Adventure City.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Overview: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
Overview: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers after the death of King T’Challa.
